original_title: Viktor Schauberger: Nature Was My Teacher
overview: Viktor Schauberger (1885-1958) made an extraordinary contribution to knowledge of the natural world.  He intuited what we now recognise as the quantum or subtle energy effects of water. His understanding was built up from shamanic and experiential observation of Nature in the untamed Alpine wilderness. His motto: “Observe and Copy Nature”.
title: Viktor Schauberger: Nature Was My Teacher
